item.title: 独家：消息人士称意大利税务警察搜查亚马逊，展开新一轮税务调查
item.description: 两名知情人士向路透社透露，意大利税务警察周四对亚马逊位于米兰的总部进行了搜查，这是针对这家美国科技巨头展开的新一轮逃税调查。【原文：Italian tax police carried out searches on Thursday at Amazon's headquarters in Milan in a new tax evasion investigation into the U.S. tech giant, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 铁山公司预测年度营收将超预期，得益于强劲的数据中心需求
item.description: 铁山公司周四预测2026财年营收将超出华尔街预期，因企业正加大土地租赁支出以建设数据中心，为人工智能工作负载提供支持。【原文：Iron Mountain forecast fiscal 2026 revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, as enterprises ramp up spending on land leases to set up data centers powering artificial intelligence workloads.】

item.title: 总部位于阿姆斯特丹的人工智能公司Nebius将在法国里尔附近建造一座240兆瓦的数据中心。
item.description: 总部位于阿姆斯特丹的人工智能云服务公司Nebius周四宣布，计划在法国里尔附近的贝蒂讷建造一座240兆瓦的新数据中心。该项目建成后将成为欧洲规模最大的数据中心之一。【原文：Nebius , the Amsterdam-based AI cloud services firm, is planning a new 240-megawatt data centre in Béthune, France, near Lille, that will be one of Europe’s largest when it is finished, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: Anthropic将向支持人工智能监管的美国政治团体捐赠2000万美元
item.description: 据该公司周四发布的声明称，Anthropic将斥资2000万美元支持那些主张监管人工智能行业的美国政治候选人。【原文：Anthropic will spend $20 million to back U.S. political candidates who support regulating the AI industry, according to a company statement released on Thursday.】

item.title: 意大利铁路运营商Italo选择Starlink为列车提供卫星互联网服务
item.description: 意大利高速铁路运营商Italo周四宣布，将在其所有列车上引入SpaceX的Starlink系统，成为全球首家采用低轨道卫星通信服务的主要铁路公司。【原文：Italian high‑speed rail operator Italo said on Thursday it would introduce SpaceX's Starlink system across its fleet, becoming the world's first major train company to rely on the low‑Earth‑orbit satellite connectivity service.】

item.title: 早盘竞价：就业数据冲击利率押注
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 汉堡王母公司餐饮品牌集团第四季度销售额超预期
item.description: 餐厅品牌集团周四公布的第四季度同店销售额超出预期，得益于旗下汉堡王和蒂姆霍顿斯连锁店的客流量表现强劲。【原文：Restaurant Brands reported fourth-quarter comparable sales above estimates on Thursday, helped by resilient traffic at its Burger King and Tim Hortons chains.】

item.title: 庞巴迪第四季度营收因公务机交付量增加而上升
item.description: 庞巴迪周四公布第四季度营收增长，这家加拿大公务机制造商在2025年最后三个月交付了更多飞机。【原文：Bombardier on Thursday reported higher fourth-quarter revenue as the Canadian business jet maker delivered more planes during the last three months of 2025.】

item.title: 全球航运业坚持绿色投资，尽管碳价推迟
item.description: 航运业巨头正无视特朗普政府对全球碳定价的反对，继续推进数十亿美元的减排投资，多家公司高管及路透社数据分析显示。【原文：The shipping industry's biggest players are shrugging off Trump administration opposition to a global carbon price and are forging ahead with billions of dollars in emissions-reducing investments, according to company officials and a Reuters analysis of data.】

item.title: ARKO石油公司通过扩大规模的美国IPO融资2亿美元
item.description: 燃料分销商ARKO石油公司将其扩大的美国首次公开募股定价在预告区间下限，筹集资金近2亿美元。【原文：Fuel distributor ARKO Petroleum priced its upsized U.S. initial public offering at the low end of its indicated range, raising nearly $200 million.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯首席执行官：当前经营方针是"盈利性增长"
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰首席执行官奥拉·卡伦纽斯周四试图安抚投资者，消除他们对这家豪华车制造商可能放弃"价值优先于销量"战略的担忧，他表示公司现阶段的宗旨是"盈利性增长"。【原文：Mercedes-Benz CEO Ola Kaellenius sought to reassure investors on Thursday over a possible retreat from the premium carmaker's 'value over volume' strategy, saying that the company mantra was now "profitable growth".】

item.title: 独家：中国比亚迪与吉利竞购墨西哥汽车厂，谋求在墨西哥立足点
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国两大汽车制造商比亚迪和吉利已进入最终竞购名单，争夺日产-梅赛德斯-奔驰在墨西哥的工厂。随着美国关税导致该国工厂关闭和裁员潮，中国正寻求在墨西哥建立制造据点。【原文：Two of China's leading automakers, BYD and Geely, are among the finalists vying to purchase a Nissan–Mercedes-Benz plant in Mexico, according to a person familiar with the matter, as China seeks a manufacturing foothold in a country where U.S. tariffs are fueling factory closures and layoffs.】

item.title: 独家：中美贸易缓和推动中国关键科技限制措施搁置
item.description: 特朗普政府已搁置多项针对北京的关键科技安全措施，此举正值两国总统四月会晤前夕。消息人士称，这些措施包括禁止中国电信在美国开展业务，并限制向美国数据中心销售中国设备。【原文：The Trump administration has shelved a number of key tech security measures aimed at Beijing ahead of an April meeting between the two countries' presidents. The measures include a ban on China Telecom's U.S. operations and restrictions on sales of Chinese equipment for U.S. data centers, sources said.】

item.title: 另寻迪士尼魔力：加拿大游客赴美旅游人数领跌
item.description: 今年，尽管全球旅游趋势依然强劲，但前往美国的外国游客却有所减少，因此更多加拿大人选择跨越大西洋，去体验迪士尼的魔力。【原文：More Canadians this year are seeking out Disney magic across the Atlantic Ocean, as fewer foreign visitors come to the United States even though worldwide travel trends remain robust.】

item.title: 美国航空工会因利润增长乏力加大对董事会施压力度
item.description: 多年来，美国航空在盈利能力方面一直落后于达美航空和联合航空。如今，其工会正将这一差距转化为治理问题，敦促董事们对高层管理层的责任进行问责。【原文：For years, American Airlines has lagged Delta Air Lines and United Airlines on profitability. Now its unions are turning that gap into a governance issue, pressing directors for accountability at the top.】

item.title: 美国股市期货小幅走高，因数据缓解经济担忧
item.description: 周四美国股指期货小幅走高，强劲的就业增长和失业率下降缓解了市场对经济的担忧，同时投资者正等待通胀数据和企业财报的发布。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Thursday as stronger jobs growth and a fall in unemployement rate eased concerns over the economy, while markets awaited inflation data and corporate earnings.】

item.title: 网络安全公司Check Point Software第四季度利润超预期
item.description: 周四公布的财报显示，Check Point软件技术公司第四季度利润超出预期，这得益于其保护企业网络免受网络威胁的产品销售额增长。【原文：Check Point Software Technologies beat expectations for fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, boosted by sales gains in its products that protect and prevent corporate networks from cyber threats.】

item.title: 勃肯鞋季度营收未达预期，消费者削减非必需品开支
item.description: 勃肯鞋周四公布的季度营收未达华尔街预期，因消费者谨慎消费及部分地区需求不均衡拖累了整体销售。【原文：Birkenstock missed Wall Street expectations for first-quarter revenue on Thursday, as cautious consumers and uneven demand in some regions weighed on overall sales.】

item.title: 独家：中国买家抢购美国高粱、澳大利亚大麦，国内玉米供应趋紧
item.description: 贸易消息人士称，近几个月中国买家大幅增加了饲料谷物采购量，在雨水损害国内玉米收成后，大量购入澳大利亚大麦和美国高粱。【原文：Chinese buyers have ramped up feed grain purchases in recent months, taking large volumes of Australian barley and U.S. sorghum after rain damaged the domestic corn harvest, trade sources said.】

item.title: 字节跳动新AI视频模型引发热潮，中国寻求再现"深度搜索"奇迹
item.description: 字节跳动的新视频生成人工智能模型已赢得埃隆·马斯克等人的赞赏，在中国引发热议。该模型被比作DeepSeek，因仅需少量提示就能生成电影级剧情而广受好评。【原文：ByteDance's new video-generating artificial intelligence model has already impressed the likes of Elon Musk and gone viral in China, where it has been compared to DeepSeek and won praise for its ability to produce cinematic storylines with just a few prompts.】

item.title: 与特朗普有关联的世界自由金融公司将推出外汇汇款平台
item.description: 由美国总统唐纳德·特朗普家族支持的加密货币企业World Liberty Financial周四宣布，计划推出一款新的外汇与汇款平台，提供简化服务并降低手续费。【原文：World Liberty Financial, a crypto venture backed by the family of U.S. President Donald Trump, said on Thursday it plans to roll out a new foreign exchange and remittance platform, offering simplified services with lower fees.】

item.title: 赛诺菲新任首席执行官贝伦·加里霍是谁？
item.description: 法国制药巨头赛诺菲周四任命贝伦·加里霍为新任首席执行官，此前该公司决定不再续聘保罗·赫德森的任期。【原文：French drugmaker Sanofi on Thursday appointed Belén Garijo as its new chief executive after choosing not to renew the mandate of Paul Hudson.】

item.title: 美国在亚太经合组织会议上推动人工智能资金和渔业技术，以应对与中国竞争
item.description: 特朗普政府本周在中国南部举行的亚太经合组织（APEC）会议上大力推广人工智能出口和海上监控技术，华盛顿正试图以此对抗北京的技术和海上影响力。【原文：The Trump administration is promoting artificial intelligence exports and maritime surveillance technology at Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) meetings in southern China this week, as Washington seeks to counter Beijing’s technological and maritime influence.】

item.title: 日产季度营业利润暴跌44%
item.description: 日产汽车周四公布，第三季度营业利润暴跌44%，至175亿日元（约合1.1437亿美元）。这家陷入困境的日本汽车制造商在美国和中国等市场面临激烈竞争。【原文：Nissan Motor reported a 44% fall in third-quarter operating profit to 17.5 billion yen ($114.37 million) on Thursday, as the struggling Japanese automaker faced heavy competition in markets such as the U.S. and China.】

item.title: 中国对电动汽车制造商与欧盟单独谈判的态度有所软化
item.description: 中国商务部发言人周四表示，中方期待更多中国电动汽车制造商与欧盟达成最低价格协议，此番表态缓和了此前对企业单独与欧盟谈判的批评态度。【原文：China looks forward to more of its EV makers reaching agreements on minimum prices with the European Union, a Chinese commerce ministry spokesperson said on Thursday, softening its previous criticism of firms negotiating with the bloc individually.】

item.title: Adyen报告2025年下半年营收增长21%
item.description: 荷兰支付处理商Adyen周四公布，2025年下半年净收入达12.7亿欧元（约合15.1亿美元），按固定汇率计算同比增长21%。这一业绩为其强劲增长的一年画上句号——该公司不仅超越了陷入困境的欧洲竞争对手，更巩固了其在与美国巨头PayPal和Stripe竞争中的地位。【原文：Dutch payments processor Adyen reported net revenue of 1.27 billion euros ($1.51 billion) for the second half of 2025 on Thursday, up 21% on a constant currency basis, capping a year of robust growth that saw it outpace struggling European rivals and solidify its position against U.S. giants PayPal and Stripe.】

item.title: 英国选择汇丰银行作为其数字债券试点发行的平台提供商
item.description: 英国已选定汇丰银行的区块链平台运行该国代币化或数字化政府债券的试点发行，该银行周四表示。此举使英国在探索基于区块链的主权债务方面领先于其他七国集团成员国。【原文：The UK has chosen HSBC's blockchain platform to run the country's pilot issuance of tokenised or digital government bonds, the bank said on Thursday, a move that puts Britain ahead of its G7 peers in exploring blockchain-based sovereign debt.】

item.title: 百达资本将以66亿美元价格向黑石集团、EQT出售废物管理公司Urbaser
item.description: 私营股权公司Platinum Equity周四在一份声明中表示，已同意以66亿美元的价格将西班牙废物管理公司Urbaser出售给黑石集团和EQT。【原文：Privately-held Platinum Equity has agreed to sell Spanish waste management company Urbaser to Blackstone and EQT for $6.6 billion, the company said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 爱马仕首席执行官称爱泼斯坦是金融掠夺者，认为他是"目标"
item.description: 爱马仕首席执行官阿克塞尔·杜马斯表示，他多次拒绝杰弗里·爱泼斯坦的会面请求。【原文：Hermes CEO Axel Dumas said he resisted multiple attempts by Jeffrey Epstein to meet with him.】

item.title: 中国联想警告内存短缺将对个人电脑出货量构成压力
item.description: 中国联想集团周四警告称，随着内存芯片短缺问题持续恶化，个人电脑出货量正面临日益增大的压力。【原文：China's Lenovo Group warned on Thursday about mounting pressure on PC shipments as a worsening memory-chip shortage grips the industry.】
